metadata.name: Vidhin's English Regexes
metadata.description:
Sorting streams using [TRaSH Guides](https://trash-guides.info) regex + Ranked Stream Expressions. Fully **auto-syncs** updates to regex patterns and expressions.

 * **Quality & source** — Remux, Bluray, Web tiers; repack/proper; season packs.
 * **Anime** — BD/Remux/Web tiers, SeaDex Best/Alt, uncensored bonus, penalties.
 * **Audio** — Full hierarchy.
 * **Visual** — HDR, Dolby Vision, HDR10/10+.
 * **Movie** — Editions, boutique labels.
 * **Streaming** — Source tags, UHD/HD boosts.
 * **Penalties** — Low-quality and undesired tags.

 * **ⓘ Requires Stream Expression Score in sort** (not Regex)
 * Add `{stream.seScore}` and `{stream.rseMatched}` to formatter
 * ⚠️ [How to customize scores](https://github.com/Vidhin05/Releases-Regex#customizing-scores)
metadata.author: Vidhin05
